meanings.definition: Able to be classified or categorized.
meanings.sent1: The different types of animals at the zoo are classifiable based on their habitats.
meanings.sent2: The books in the library are classifiable by genre for easy access.
meanings.sent3: It was a classifiable mess in the classroom after the art project.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was a classifiable rainbow of colors.
meanings.sent5: The classifiable clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton candy.

meanings.definition: Capable of being grouped or organized.
meanings.sent1: The classifiable toys were neatly arranged on the shelves.
meanings.sent2: The classifiable data was organized into different categories for analysis.
meanings.sent3: The classifiable puzzle pieces fit together perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were a classifiable jumble after the exciting news.
meanings.sent5: The classifiable flowers in the garden bloomed in vibrant colors.
